directions: Halve any large carrots and place in a large saucepan with the butter, sugar and a pinch of salt. Cover the carrots half way with water and bring to the boil. Reduce the heat to a simmer, then cover and cook for 15-20 minutes until just tender.
Turn up the heat and cook until the water has evaporated and you’re left with a buttery glaze. This will take 5-10 minutes. Stir in the parsley and season to taste.
ingredients: 2 tbsp finely chopped fresh parsley, to serve
title: Vichy carrots
